title: Pole Goals (with Zuri Salahuddin)
itunes:title: Pole Goals (with Zuri Salahuddin)
description:
Is splitting a pole bad luck? Langston and his guest Zuri Salahuddin (South Side on HBO Max) take a walk down the road of this oddly specific conspiracy theory.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
